description: SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP (Applications based on Web Dynpro ABAP), versions - SAP_UI - 750,752,753,754,755, SAP_BASIS - 702, 731 does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.
